question:
Consider the following statements about V.O.Chidambaranar Port, formerly Tuticorin Port:
  1. It is the only port in South India to provide a direct weekly container service to the United States
  2. It is the only artificial port in South India
Which among the following statements is/ are correct?
explanation:
It is the only port in South India to provide a direct weekly container service to the United States
This is a correct statement. 
It is the only artificial port in South India
This is not a correct statement. Chennai Port is another example of artificial port in South India.
